content: I've just started with MusicTheory.net, but I like the way the lessons are structured. It's easy to follow and the exercises are helpful. I'm looking forward to diving deeper into chord progressions and scales. By the way, I've been thinking about buying a ukulele, as I had a great experience trying it out at a music workshop recently. Do you think understanding music theory would also help me with playing the ukulele, or is it more focused on guitar and piano?
